==== Introduction ====
My name is Tim Sally and I am an Undergraduate in the Computer Science Department at University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.  I am also studying in English Literature. I like to swim and lift weights in my spare time and I am very interested in the intersection between computers and literature.  I am very approachable and don't mind spending time giving advice or offering what help I can, so feel free to contact me!
==== Academic Interests ====
{*} Computer Graphics

{*} Simulation and Visualization 

{*} Cryptography

{*} Implications of Digital Rights Management

{*} The Role of Literature in a Technological Society

{*} Coffee
